edu.umd.cs.guitar.ripper

Class RipperMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.guitar.ripper.RipperMain

  • public abstract class RipperMain
extends java.lang.Object
    Base template for ripper main function. This takes care of a lot of the boilerplate code such as setting up the logger, the ripper monitor, the id generator, and the widget configuration file.
